Articles.Content:
Greetings all!

I've been playing for months now and benefitting from the helpful tips and inspirations that are all over these forums, but I never registered till now. So, hello awesome ksp community! 

I am always blown away by what people make, both in-game and of course for the game in the form of mind-blowingly complex and enriching mods that I willingly destroy my performance with in huge numbers.

So thank you all for being cool, and happy launching.

-Tiber

Welcome!

Consider yourself one of the family.

Happy landings!
